text: wallh subhanah hu aldhy abtda khalaqakum 'ayuha alnaas min adam ealayh alslam; 'iidh khalaqah min tyn, thuma kuntum sulalat wnsla mnh, fajaeal lakum mstqarana tstqrwn fyh, wahu 'arham alnsa', wmustwdeana tuhfazun fyh, wahu aslab alrjal, qad bayanaa alhujaj wmyzna aladlt, wahkmnaha liqawm yfhmwn mawaqie alhujaj wmwade alebr
